title: (x) Kalfaret Brygghus straight-sided tech sans - Klampenborg {Manlio}
author: frode frank

comments.content:
Looks pretty handmade (adjusted/edited), but probably started from an excisting design?! My own Sophisto carry some of the feeling in this typeface... especially the “a” and “e”

[http://www.macrhino.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20091204155357/http:/www.macrhino.com/ "http://www.macrhino.com")
